attributes.additional_details: Because it is being built on Grade 2 agricultural land, it's HUGE!!! There are health implications, the value of our homes will be impacted and it will be an eyesore.
attributes.background: Prevent this proposal from coming to fruition.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Until planning permission is submitted for this project developing proposals for new generating infrastructure is a matter for individual businesses, not the Government or Parliament.
